posts.post_content: This is would actually be an extremely powerful card in competitive play. 2 for a 2/2 first strike is on par with [White Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=White Knight), and the damage prevention ability is arguably superior to [White Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=White Knight)'s protection from black.
